body_html: I don't think missing Safari support is that big a deal (more just a nice-to-have), but it may help others if TB displayed a warning when loading inside of Safari, explaining it's not a supported browser (like a dismiss-able banner, or even on the command line if it detects a Safari user agent). I'm sure like me, others on the Mac will make the same mistake, since in the tutorials for TensorBoard there's no mention of browser incompatibilities. Even the first time I skimmed the TensorBoard README, I missed the browser compatibility warning.
